subject: p14841168
History: Year old woman with worsened PCO2, please eval intrathoracic process.
Findings: There is moderate cardiomegaly which is unchanged compared to previous studies. The left hilum is enlarged but stable. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax are seen. There is an opacity of left lower lobe that likely reflects developing pneumonia versus atelectasis.
Impression: Left lower lobe opacification that represents developing pneumonia versus atelectasis.
